data.title: Valentine’s Day Gift Guide: The Best Hotel Packages Inspired By Romantic Movies
data.meta_description: From the iconic cityscapes of "Pretty Woman" to the breathtaking landscapes of "Out of Africa," countless movie-inspired hotel packages offer couples a unique and unforgettable experience.
data.text:
Everyone loves a good romantic movie, and now you can bring the magic of your favorite films to life with a romantic hotel stay. From the iconic cityscapes of "Pretty Woman" to the breathtaking landscapes of "Out of Africa," countless movie-inspired hotel packages offer couples a unique and unforgettable experience. So whether you're looking for a cozy getaway or a grand adventure, these hotels have curated packages that capture the spirit of the world's most romantic films. So get ready to be swept off your feet and indulge in a memorable escape with your significant other.

"Shotgun Wedding" At Eden Roc Cap Cana

Step into the world of the new romantic comedy "Shotgun Wedding" (featuring Jennifer Lopez)" and relive the magic with a stay at Eden Roc Cap Cana. Featured in a scene from the movie, the stunning cenote at Eden Roc sets the stage for the unforgettable moment between Jennifer Lopez and Josh Duhamel. In addition, guests at the hotel can book their own romantic experience in the cenote, be it a candlelit dinner for two or a couples massage on the deck surrounded by its natural beauty. With the cenote as the backdrop, you'll create memories that will last a lifetime in this truly romantic setting.

"James Bond Casino Royale" At The Ocean Club, A Four Seasons Resort

Nestled amidst the lush greenery and turquoise waters of the Bahamas, The Ocean Club, A Four Seasons Resort, awaits, offering a romantic escape unlike any other. This iconic resort, forever etched in the annals of film history as the backdrop to the 2006 remake of "Casino Royale," is a true testament to the glamour and excitement of James Bond's world. And now, guests have the opportunity to immerse themselves in this world, to experience the thrill of being Bond for a moment. By booking the luxurious 4-bed Villa Residence, you'll enter into a realm of opulence, where indoor-outdoor living blends seamlessly and a private infinity pool overlooking the sea provides a serene escape from the outside world. All scenes from the film were shot on location, allowing you to truly live the life of Bond and bask in the romance that surrounded him. In addition, the Ocean Club celebrated its 60th year in 2022, and to honor this occasion, it is offering the 007 Secret Menu experience, a tribute to seven of Bond's classic 1960s films.

"Grand Hotel" At Grand Hotel Tremezzo

In the 1932 classic film "Grand Hotel," Greta Garbo was inspired by those who dreamed of retiring to Tremezzo. Today, guests can make that dream a reality with a stay at the Grand Hotel Tremezzo. Book the "Suite Greta," a tribute to the golden age Hollywood actress who referred to the palace as her "sunny, happy place." The suite features floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the elegant room with natural light and offer breathtaking views of the lake. Adorned with gold-tone details and an opulent bathroom featuring Breche de Vendome marble, including a round jacuzzi tub, the suite provides the ultimate in luxury and relaxation.

"Some Like it Hot" At Hotel del Coronado

Nestled in the heart of Southern California, Hotel del Coronado serves as a romantic movie-themed getaway for couples who are fans of Hollywood classics. Designated a National Historic Landmark in 1977, The Del was the setting for the timeless romantic comedy "Some Like It Hot." Starring Marylin Monroe, Jack Lemmon, and Tony Curtis, the 1958 film showcased the spectacular sun-drenched Victorian architecture of The Del as the perfect backdrop for the 1929 story. Recognized as the #1 comedy of all time by the American Film Institute, "Some Like It Hot" has a special place in film and Del history. Although only exterior scenes were filmed at the hotel, the interior scenes have a distinct Del-like quality, making it easy to imagine living in a world of the movie. So book a stay at The Del and escape to a romantic movie-themed getaway, where the sun-soaked Victorian charm of the hotel sets the stage for your own Hollywood fairy tale.

"Like Father" At Jamaica Inn

Jamaica Inn is a romantic movie-themed getaway, having been the setting for several iconic films like “Father” (2018), “Sea Wife” (1957), and “The Man Who Knew Too Little” (1997). With the "Jamaica Inn Cinephile Experience Package," guests can immerse themselves in Old Hollywood and colonial charm, staying in luxurious accommodations and exploring movie locations through guided tours. The family-run resort is also steeped in movie history, hosting famous guests like Ian Fleming, Marilyn Monroe, Arthur Miller, and Meghan Markle. For movie lovers and romantic couples alike, staying at Jamaica Inn is a chance to live out their own cinematic fairy tale surrounded by iconic sites and stories of film history.

"Dirty Dancing" At Lake Lure Inn and Spa

Experience a romantic movie-themed getaway at The 1927 Lake Lure Inn and Spa. This beautiful inn, located among the Blue Ridge Foothills, was the setting for the iconic lake lift scene in the 1987 classic movie "Dirty Dancing." Each year, film fans gather to celebrate at the Dirty Dancing Festival, which includes a lake lift competition, a lakeside screening of the film, and overnights in Dirty Dancing-themed cabins at the inn. So book your stay and relive one of the most romantic movie scenes of all time.

"Pretty Woman" At Beverly Wilshire, A Four Seasons Hotel

Escape to a fairy tale and relive the romance of the classic film "Pretty Woman" with Beverly Wilshire’s exclusive movie-themed package. Experience over-the-top luxury in one of the hotel’s highly sought-after Specialty Suites, complete with lavish amenities and VIP offerings. Take a behind-the-scenes tour of Rodeo Drive's most famous fashion houses with your own personal wardrobe consultant and stylist, dine on gourmet cuisine at THEBlvd, and enjoy a romantic dinner for two in the privacy of your Suite. Indulge in a couples massage at the award-winning Spa, followed by a relaxing bath with personalized aromatherapy oils hand-drawn by our Bath Attendant. Round-trip transportation in a Mercedes Sedan is included, ensuring a truly star-studded experience.
